answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Whole body numbness that comes and goes can be due to a mini stroke or transient ischemic attack, compression of spinal up high up in cervical spine, Vit B12 deficiency, anemia, vaso-vagal attack, multiple sclerosis, hypothyroidism, diabetes and panic attack. It can also be a type of seizure.A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
it could be go to a doctor and check ur blood for lime disease

question: I woke up in the middle of the night and my insides felt numb and tingly. I was sweating and wanted a glass of water. I could not hold the glass because I was numb and had no feelings or sensations in my hands.
title: Is this a symptom of Lymes Disease?
